item.title: By: To Thunderlord! at AFK Gamer
item.dc:creator: To Thunderlord! at AFK Gamer
item.description: [...] WoW Forums: “THIS is why warriors are whining so much” WoW Forums: A zippy poem to commemorate Patch 2.0.1 — I hope my guild’s warriors don’t catch wind of this. We might need them for loot farms on Wednesday, although from the looks of the patch changes and all the discussions, heh, maybe we won’t. WoW Forums: “Million warrior march” General forum thread discussion. Oh and by the way, the title “Million Gnome March” was for the LAST warrior protest in January 2005. We’ll need a new catchy title for THIS protest. Gnome Tea party was also taken for the LAST protest. (My stuff about the LAST protest: They Will Overcome, The Gnome Tea Party and The Tea Party in Pictures.) [...]
item.content:encoded: […] WoW Forums: “THIS is why warriors are whining so much” WoW Forums: A zippy poem to commemorate Patch 2.0.1 — I hope my guild’s warriors don’t catch wind of this. We might need them for loot farms on Wednesday, although from the looks of the patch changes and all the discussions, heh, maybe we won’t. WoW Forums: “Million warrior march” General forum thread discussion. Oh and by the way, the title “Million Gnome March” was for the LAST warrior protest in January 2005. We’ll need a new catchy title for THIS protest. Gnome Tea party was also taken for the LAST protest. (My stuff about the LAST protest: They Will Overcome, The Gnome Tea Party and The Tea Party in Pictures.) […]

item.title: By: drk_ghost: https://afkgamer.github.io/afkgamer-com/archives/2005/01/31/
item.dc:creator: drk_ghost: https://afkgamer.github.io/afkgamer-com/archives/2005/01/31/
item.description: [...] Dark Ghost (drk_ghost) wrote,@ 2005-02-03 09:58:00      https://afkgamer.github.io/afkgamer-com/archives/2005/01/31/the-tea-party-in-pictures/http://www.cesspit.net/drupal/node/491the million naked gnome march. it was started because the Warrior class got nurfed..they took down a server.wow thats funny...time to switch from a warrior class.. (sighs)dunno what too though.. gonna keep the name kavasis though../me sighs.(Post a new comment) martinhesselius 2005-02-03 04:28 pm UTC (link) Thoughts - Take a coiple of the beginning Quests?They give extra XP for finishing them.(Reply to this) shadrone 2005-02-03 05:14 pm UTC (link) How exactly is the warrior nerfed? If you think the warrior is nerfed, try playing a hunter.(Reply to this) hearthwitch 2005-02-03 05:45 pm UTC (link) When did this happen?(Reply to this) xreeedactionx 2005-02-03 06:18 pm UTC (link) Eh, nurfed? Gotta crappy 'puter so no WoW for me.Is the warrior class too weak or too strong? Or are people just being asses?Just wondering...(Reply to this) drk_ghost 2005-02-03 09:53 pm UTC (link) 1) i quest.. i quest LOTS.. 2) if an entire server was angry enough to protest, it's prolly nerfed in a bad way.. i dunno actually how, bit i myself didn't like the warrior, it didn't feel ballanced to me.3) i felt the warrior class was rather boring.. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Dark Ghost (drk_ghost) wrote,@ 2005-02-03 09:58:00      https://afkgamer.github.io/afkgamer-com/archives/2005/01/31/the-tea-party-in-pictures/http://www.cesspit.net/drupal/node/491the million naked gnome march. it was started because the Warrior class got nurfed..they took down a server.wow thats funny…time to switch from a warrior class.. (sighs)dunno what too though.. gonna keep the name kavasis though../me sighs.(Post a new comment) martinhesselius 2005-02-03 04:28 pm UTC (link) Thoughts – Take a coiple of the beginning Quests?They give extra XP for finishing them.(Reply to this) shadrone 2005-02-03 05:14 pm UTC (link) How exactly is the warrior nerfed? If you think the warrior is nerfed, try playing a hunter.(Reply to this) hearthwitch 2005-02-03 05:45 pm UTC (link) When did this happen?(Reply to this) xreeedactionx 2005-02-03 06:18 pm UTC (link) Eh, nurfed? Gotta crappy ‘puter so no WoW for me.Is the warrior class too weak or too strong? Or are people just being asses?Just wondering…(Reply to this) drk_ghost 2005-02-03 09:53 pm UTC (link) 1) i quest.. i quest LOTS.. 2) if an entire server was angry enough to protest, it’s prolly nerfed in a bad way.. i dunno actually how, bit i myself didn’t like the warrior, it didn’t feel ballanced to me.3) i felt the warrior class was rather boring.. […]

item.title: By: MMREVIEWS - Massive Multiplayer Reviews
item.dc:creator: MMREVIEWS - Massive Multiplayer Reviews
item.description:
<strong>World of Warcraft Warrior Protest...</strong>
Recently there was a huge protest by warrirors and Blizzards response was to ban everyone for 3 days.Check out the article there are a ton of pictures of the event....
item.content:encoded:
World of Warcraft Warrior Protest…

Recently there was a huge protest by warrirors and Blizzards response was to ban everyone for 3 days.Check out the article there are a ton of pictures of the event….

item.title: By: Cosmik
item.dc:creator: Cosmik
item.description:
No, it wasn't me.
If I had attended this event I would have created a name to fit right in with the crowd. Like Koolgnome1. Or Assgoblin.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Nerfbat

item.description: <strong>WoW Warriors Unite!</strong> Blizzard recently took the nerfbat and smashed Warriors in the face with it. Will World of Warcraft fans stand for it? Apparently not. In one of the greatest protests in recent MMOG history, WoW Warrior fans logged on to the Argent Dawn server and foug...
item.content:encoded:
WoW Warriors Unite!
Blizzard recently took the nerfbat and smashed Warriors in the face with it. Will World of Warcraft fans stand for it? Apparently not. In one of the greatest protests in recent MMOG history, WoW Warrior fans logged on to the Argent Dawn server and foug…
